name: Orthello, Son of Death
description:
Take a leap into an epic saga to defeat your father: Death

SUMMARY

Death has turned evil after being left to rot as the ferryman of the Spirit Realm for thousands of years. Jealous of how other gods are far more worshipped, Death uses his power to trap souls of the living in the Spirit Realm and absorbing them gaining massive power.  After unsuccessfully trying to stop Death you get banished to the Mortal Realm. On earth you must find a way to stop Death, however every mortal you kill on your quest sends their soul to the Spirit Realm and empowers Death.

FEATURES
  • Every few levels gain a new class and equip multiple classes to create a unique build
  •  There are 12 base classes, 66 hybrid classes, and 18 triple classes giving a total of 96 distinct classes
  •  Every class has a unique style with multiple ways to play and invest talents into
